languages.text: {n}Сотня мальпийцев вызвалась пройти испытание веры. Шесть десятков и двое пережили его, доказав нерушимость своих убеждений и вызвав уважение Ордена Молота.{/n}
{n}One hundred Malpians have volunteered to undergo the trial of faith. Seventy-four have survived, proving the steadfastness of their beliefs and earning respect of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сотня мальпийцев вызвалась пройти испытание веры. Шесть десятков и двое пережили его, доказав нерушимость своих убеждений и вызвав уважение Ордена Молота.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}A hundred of the Malfesians have volunteered to challenge the trial of faith. Six dozens and two of them have survived it, proving the steadfastness of their beliefs and earning respect of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

{n}A hundred of the Malfesians have volunteered to challenge the trial of faith. Six dozens and two of them have survived it, proving the steadfastness of their beliefs and earning respect of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}
{n}One hundred Malpians have volunteered to undergo the trial of faith. Seventy-four have survived, proving the steadfastness of their beliefs and earning respect of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}一百名马尔皮人自愿接受信仰的考验。有七十四人幸存下来，证明了他们坚定的信仰，赢得了重锤修会的敬意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One hundred Malpians have volunteered to undergo the trial of faith. Seventy-four have survived, proving the steadfastness of their beliefs and earning respect of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}一百名马尔皮人自愿接受信仰的考验。有七十四人幸存下来，证明了他们坚定的信仰，赢得了重锤修会的敬意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cien malpianos se han presentado voluntarios para someterse a la prueba de fe. Setenta y cuatro han sobrevivido, demostrando la firmeza de sus creencias y ganándose el respeto de la Orden del Martillo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One hundred Malpians have volunteered to undergo the trial of faith. Seventy-four have survived, proving the steadfastness of their beliefs and earning respect of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cien malpianos se han presentado voluntarios para someterse a la prueba de fe. Setenta y cuatro han sobrevivido, demostrando la firmeza de sus creencias y ganándose el respeto de la Orden del Martillo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}100人のマルピ人が信仰の試練に志願した。74人が生き残り、自らの信仰の強さを証明し、鉄槌の修道会の尊敬を集めた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One hundred Malpians have volunteered to undergo the trial of faith. Seventy-four have survived, proving the steadfastness of their beliefs and earning respect of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}100人のマルピ人が信仰の試練に志願した。74人が生き残り、自らの信仰の強さを証明し、鉄槌の修道会の尊敬を集めた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cent Malpiens se portent volontaires pour subir l'épreuve de foi. Soixante-quatorze d'entre eux survivent, démontrant l'inflexibilité de leurs croyances et gagnant le respect de l'Ordre du Marteau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}One hundred Malpians have volunteered to undergo the trial of faith. Seventy-four have survived, proving the steadfastness of their beliefs and earning respect of the Order of the Hammer.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cent Malpiens se portent volontaires pour subir l'épreuve de foi. Soixante-quatorze d'entre eux survivent, démontrant l'inflexibilité de leurs croyances et gagnant le respect de l'Ordre du Marteau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Einhundert Malpianer haben sich freiwillig für die Glaubensprüfung gemeldet. Vierundsiebzig haben überlebt und dadurch ihren festen Glauben bewiesen und sich den Respekt des Ordens des Hammers verdient.{/n}
